title: Replace entire orange background with plain white background

requirements.text: Replace the orange background across the entire site with a plain white background by ensuring the global background theme token(s) and base page background styles render pure white everywhere (including areas outside sections and behind content).
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing the site at any scroll position, the page background renders as plain white with no orange background visible behind/around sections.
The global background token used by Tailwind classes (e.g., `bg-background`) corresponds to pure white in light mode.
The `body` (and, if necessary, `html`/`#root`) background is explicitly styled to white so that any empty space/margins outside components do not show orange.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all backend logic within the single Motoko actor (no backend work is expected for this request).
nonGoals: Changing the hero background image or other generated images unless they are the source of the orange background.
Adding new pages, features, or authentication changes.
